subject: Reminder: Timecard Submission
body:
Noah,

Your timecard for pay period 14 hasn’t been submitted yet. Please complete it before COB today so payroll can process correctly.

Thanks,
Nick

subject: Re: Reminder: Timecard Submission
body:
Nick,

Thanks for the reminder. I was in the field yesterday and forgot to log my overtime hours. I’ll submit before lunch today.

- Noah

subject: Leave Request Clarification
body:
Amelia,

I received your leave request for July 24–26. Just confirm: will you be on call for urgent case consults during that time, or fully unavailable?

Nick

subject: Re: Leave Request Clarification
body:
Nick,

Fully unavailable — I’ll be out of state visiting family. I’ve already handed off my open reports to Oliver.

Thanks,
Amelia

subject: Schedule Adjustment
body:
Maverick,

The quarterly systems check you planned for July 29 conflicts with SAC Garcia’s leadership briefing. Can you adjust to the morning of July 30 instead?

Nick

subject: Re: Schedule Adjustment
body:
Nick,

No problem. I’ll shift the systems check to July 30 at 0800 and notify IT so they’re ready.

- Maverick

subject: Overtime Approval Needed
body:
Wyatt,

You logged 16 overtime hours for the past pay period. Please send me a quick justification note for those hours so I can finalize approval.

Nick

subject: Re: Overtime Approval Needed
body:
Nick,

The overtime was tied to the Greenville surveillance detail. We had extended evening coverage due to a suspect’s unexpected movements. I can provide logs if needed.

- Wyatt

subject: Medical Documentation
body:
Rachel,

HR flagged your last leave entry as ‘medical’ but without supporting documentation. Could you upload the required note to the system by Friday?

Nick

subject: Re: Medical Documentation
body:
Nick,

Understood. I’ll upload a doctor’s note this afternoon. The absence was due to a routine procedure, nothing that affects duty readiness.

- Rachel

subject: Timekeeping Policy Update
body:
Marcus,

Can you review the updated Bureau-wide timekeeping policy memo before I distribute? Legal’s sign-off is required since it includes language on comp time.

Nick

subject: Re: Timekeeping Policy Update
body:
Nick,

I reviewed the memo. The language is compliant, though I’d recommend clarifying the section on telework overtime. I can draft suggested wording if you’d like.

- Marcus

subject: Travel Voucher
body:
Oliver,

Your Charlotte field visit voucher is missing hotel receipts. Please upload them to the system or the travel claim will be rejected.

Nick

subject: Re: Travel Voucher
body:
Nick,

I found the missing receipts — scanning and uploading now. Thanks for catching that.

- Oliver

subject: July Leave Balances
body:
Amanda,

Here’s the updated leave balance report for the unit. Several agents are approaching their use-or-lose threshold.

Nick

subject: Re: July Leave Balances
body:
Thanks Nick — I’ll remind folks in the next staff meeting to schedule their leave before year-end.

- Amanda
